divs: Sighting Detailswe were driving on hwy 177 going north when we spotted the aircraft,red blue lights to side, flashing blue-ish light in the middle of a half circle shaped object. very obviously not an airplane, outlines were very clear.metalcoloured aircraft,was just hanging or hoovering in the sky, about the height of an airplane just taking off. when me and my son saw this and realized it was not an airplane, i took the next exit so i could go around and back on the hwy to get another look and or attempt to take a picture. it took us about 2 minutes to get back to the very same area but there was nothing there.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Shawnee
There were no other sightings in Shawnee on or around July 15th 2010
Summary: UFO with red and blue lights hovering above the trees on side of hwy.
